Instruction: Core and dice the apples. Toss them in lemon juice to prevent browning.
In a large bowl, mix diced apples, dried cranberries, chopped pecans, and lettuce.
Sprinkle crumbled feta cheese over the salad.
Drizzle balsamic vinaigrette over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Serve immediately as a refreshing side dish.
